Styles

One of those two designs may become the default one. Vote by using them!

https://img.shields.io/badge/style-flat-green.svg?style=flat
https://img.shields.io/badge/style-flat--squared-green.svg?style=flat-square

Override the default left-hand-side text with ?label=wow so healthy.

We also support .json, .png and a few others, but use that responsively.
